description.action: Evan, still in owl form, swoops down and grabs Bowser's cape in his talons, pulling it over the Koopa King's head to blind him.
Isaac, as a koala, clings to the side of the throne, watching the action unfold.
Aurelia, as a panda, blocks Bowser's path, ready to spring into action.
Aaron, as a dinosaur, charges at Bowser, knocking him off balance.
Bowser, blinded by Evan's attack, stumbles around the throne room, trying to swat at the children.
